description: Gets the indicators from an investigation. You can use the information from the indicators to determine if an IAM user and/or IAM role is involved in an unusual activity that could indicate malicious behavior and its impact.

parameters.name: GraphArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the behavior graph.

parameters.name: InvestigationId
parameters.description: The investigation ID of the investigation report.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: Lists if there are more results available. The value of nextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. Repeat the call using the returned token to retrieve the next page. Keep all other arguments unchanged. Each pagination token expires after 24 hours. Using an expired pagination token will return a Validation Exception error.

nested_items.name: GraphArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the behavior graph.

nested_items.name: InvestigationId
nested_items.description: The investigation ID of the investigation report.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: Lists if there are more results available. The value of nextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. Repeat the call using the returned token to retrieve the next page. Keep all other arguments unchanged.

nested_items.name: Indicators
nested_items.description: Lists the indicators of compromise.

nested_items.name: IndicatorType
nested_items.description: The type of indicator.

nested_items.name: IndicatorDetail
nested_items.description: Details about the indicators of compromise that are used to determine if a resource is involved in a security incident. An indicator of compromise (IOC) is an artifact observed in or on a network, system, or environment that can (with a high level of confidence) identify malicious activity or a security incident.

nested_items.name: TTPsObservedDetail
nested_items.description: Details about the indicator of compromise.

nested_items.name: Tactic
nested_items.description: The tactic used, identified by the investigation.

nested_items.name: Technique
nested_items.description: The technique used, identified by the investigation.

nested_items.name: Procedure
nested_items.description: The procedure used, identified by the investigation.

nested_items.name: IpAddress
nested_items.description: The IP address where the tactics, techniques, and procedure (TTP) was observed.

nested_items.name: APIName
nested_items.description: The name of the API where the tactics, techniques, and procedure (TTP) was observed.

nested_items.name: APISuccessCount
nested_items.description: The total number of successful API requests.

nested_items.name: APIFailureCount
nested_items.description: The total number of failed API requests.

nested_items.name: ImpossibleTravelDetail
nested_items.description: Identifies unusual and impossible user activity for an account.

nested_items.name: StartingIpAddress
nested_items.description: IP address where the resource was first used in the impossible travel.

nested_items.name: EndingIpAddress
nested_items.description: IP address where the resource was last used in the impossible travel.

nested_items.name: StartingLocation
nested_items.description: Location where the resource was first used in the impossible travel.

nested_items.name: EndingLocation
nested_items.description: Location where the resource was last used in the impossible travel.

nested_items.name: HourlyTimeDelta
nested_items.description: Returns the time difference between the first and last timestamp the resource was used.

nested_items.name: FlaggedIpAddressDetail
nested_items.description: Suspicious IP addresses that are flagged, which indicates critical or severe threats based on threat intelligence by Detective. This indicator is derived from Amazon Web Services threat intelligence.

nested_items.name: IpAddress
nested_items.description: IP address of the suspicious entity.

nested_items.name: Reason
nested_items.description: Details the reason the IP address was flagged as suspicious.

nested_items.name: NewGeolocationDetail
nested_items.description: Contains details about the new geographic location.

nested_items.name: Location
nested_items.description: Location where the resource was accessed.

nested_items.name: IpAddress
nested_items.description: IP address using which the resource was accessed.

nested_items.name: IsNewForEntireAccount
nested_items.description: Checks if the geolocation is new for the entire account.

nested_items.name: NewAsoDetail
nested_items.description: Contains details about the new Autonomous System Organization (ASO).

nested_items.name: Aso
nested_items.description: Details about the new Autonomous System Organization (ASO).

nested_items.name: IsNewForEntireAccount
nested_items.description: Checks if the Autonomous System Organization (ASO) is new for the entire account.

nested_items.name: NewUserAgentDetail
nested_items.description: Contains details about the new user agent.

nested_items.name: UserAgent
nested_items.description: New user agent which accessed the resource.

nested_items.name: IsNewForEntireAccount
nested_items.description: Checks if the user agent is new for the entire account.

nested_items.name: RelatedFindingDetail
nested_items.description: Contains details about related findings.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the related finding.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of finding.

nested_items.name: IpAddress
nested_items.description: The IP address of the finding.

nested_items.name: RelatedFindingGroupDetail
nested_items.description: Contains details about related finding groups.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the finding group.
